Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose system for in vitro coagulation studies
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Haemonetics TEG 6s Hemostasis System and TEG Manager 2.0.0 software accessory for coagulation testing using venous whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic use to provide semi-quantitative indications of hemostasis state in adult venous whole blood samples, commonly used in cardiovascular and cardiology procedures to assess hemorrhage or thrombosis before, during, and after procedures.
